content: Are there any sample implementations of open choice type questions? Also, should open choice types support multiple free-text entries when the question is repeated? thanks! @Kevin Most

Yes, you can have multiple free-text entries. I think there are some examples in the SDC implementation guide, but I'm not possible. Note that in R5, we're changing the design so that 'open' vs. 'closed' is a separate property and there are alternatives of open with string or open with non-choice values.
